Articles.Content:
Can anyone make me some missiles that will work on my crow craft? I can't make reliable missiles that don't tumble to their demise!

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/119695-CROW-Prototype-Hypersonic-Jet-%28FEEDBACK-WANTED%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/119695-CROW-Prototype-Hypersonic-Jet-%28FEEDBACK-WANTED%29)

This is the craft i wanted to mount missiles on.

Also, give me feedback on my test craft!

Have a look at this:

[http://kerbalx.com/Kerbalcrafts/Thing](http://kerbalx.com/Kerbalcrafts/Thing)

And yes, I do know I uploaded it kerbalx as "Thing" ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)
